description: Owned end-to-end development of an LLM human evaluation platform for Amazon Q, implementing human preference scoring for reinforcement learning feedback across 10+ science teams
Architected secure data infrastructure processing TBs to petabytes of daily AI chat logs within production VPC, ensuring full compliance with App Security standards
Integrated full AWS service stack (ECR, ECS, Fargate, S3) using CDK, delivering scalable cloud-native CI/CD pipeline with modular infrastructure-as-code patterns
Drive feature development and platform optimization for Yale's premier course search tool serving 6K+ undergraduates with 50K+ monthly searches
Shipped advanced location-based search feature by mapping 156 campus buildings to 4K+ course entries with efficient caching layer for data extraction
Extending visual schedule planner with campus map view using OpenStreetMap, rendering course locations with commute time estimates between classes
Led development of integrated ecosystem serving 1.5K+ users, architecting and building 4 interconnected web applications for course selection and attendance
Engineered and deployed custom OAuth SSO service from scratch, enabling seamless authentication across application ecosystem using school credentials
Maintained servers running NGINX and Ubuntu while authoring comprehensive documentation for system administration
Developed custom POS system for catering orders from scratch, implementing real-time inventory tracking and automated order processing workflows
Built scalable solution using Supabase backend for affordability and reliability, reducing order processing time by 60% for local business operations
